name: Project Boost (Starship flying game)
description:
Game controls at the bottom of the description

Game Theme:

 Exploring Space Story: You (have not decided on the name of the character yet) are the first human spacecraft that will attempt to explore the galaxy and figure out what all is out there, whether that is aliens or just another planet that humans could colonize. The twist is that the Earth is currently overrun with rogue AI that was made to fix the damage done to Earth during WWIII. What is left of humanity had to escape into space to survive and began the process of making a giant space station out near the largest of Saturn’s moons, Titan.

After many years of building and experimenting scientists were finally able to create a spacecraft able to visit other systems within the Milky Way. This adventure is done in the hope that humanity will be able to find a permanent residence or find a way to take back the Earth.

There is a health system in place that will allow you to crash into something 10 times before it kicks you back to the first level. This health is reset at each level so on every level you will start with full health. There are currently 7 levels in this build that start simple and get more complex. The first 4 have a still camera, while the last 3 have a camera that does a loose follow of the player (I will tighten this up in the future).

My first time making a 3D game with some added features. I will be back to further improve this game when I gain some more knowledge on the upgrades on want to do such as adding enemies, UI, music sound effect volume control,  and instructions in the game. I also think I will add a further storyline to this game in the future.

To close the game just close the browser window.

For now, the controls are

Space to boost up

Left Shift to boost down (mainly used if you get stuck upside down)

A to tilt left

D to tilt Right

F to rotate the ship 180 degrees so that it faces the exact opposite way
